description.title: Everything you love about iPad, now with the Apple M2 chip
text: iPad Pro 11 2023 is the most powerful iPad from Apple, offering you incredible performance, graphics and speed thanks to the Apple M2 chip.

This iPad has a Liquid Retina display with ProMotion, True Tone and P3, which provides great image quality and smooth motion. You can also enjoy high-quality sound with four speakers and Dolby Atmos support.

description.title: Work and create with a new level of convenience
text: iPad Pro 11 2023 supports Apple Pencil (2nd generation), which lets you write, draw and take notes with amazing accuracy and responsiveness. You can also connect Magic Keyboard or Smart Keyboard Folio, to turn your iPad into a laptop with a full-size keyboard and touchpad.

With iPad Pro 11 2023 you can use all your favorite apps and games from the App Store, as well as work with professional programs, such as Adobe Photoshop, Final Cut Pro and more. You can also communicate with your friends and colleagues using FaceTime HD camera with Center Stage feature, which automatically adjusts the frame based on your movement.
